title: This Guy Is A Dangerous Threat To The Republic (Ep 1662)
description:
We are losing the country. And Attorney General Merrick Garland is one of the main reasons. In this episode I address the latest troubling scandal. I also address the media meltdown over the explosive growth of the parallel economy. 

News Picks:

Big news about Devin Nunes.


Psaki refuses to admit that the real Hunter laptop, is real.

No surprise here, but more confirmation that blue states aren’t free anymore.

Liberals are in a panic over the parallel economy.


Just 22% of voters want Biden to run again.
